original_text: And when she saw Peter warming himself, she looked upon him, and said, And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth.
korean_text: 베드로가 불 쬐고 있는 것을 보고 주목하여 이르되 너도 나사렛 예수와 함께 있었도다 하거늘

sentences.original_text: And when she saw Peter warming himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 베드로가 스스로를 데우는 것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth
